SELECT ii.workflow_status AS "workflowStatus", ii.invoice_title AS "invoiceTitle",
FROM im_invoice_dtl a INNER JOIN im_invoice ii ON ii.id = a.app_id AND ii.del_flag = '0' AND ii.workflow_status != '70' WHERE a.order_no = #{orderNo} AND a.del_flag = '0' ORDER BY a.create_date, a.line_no2

FROM im_invoice_dtl a WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.del_flag = '0'

SELECT a.industry AS "industry", a.customer_diff AS "customerDiff", a.customer_ch_name AS "customerChName", a.province AS "province", a.city AS "city", a.invoice_type AS "invoiceType", a.invoice_title AS "invoiceTitle", a.taxpayer_ident_no AS "taxpayerIdentNo", a.deposit_bank AS "depositBank", a.bank_account AS "bankAccount", a.invoice_address AS "invoiceAddress", a.telephone AS "telephone", a.region AS "region", sap.name AS "provinceName", sac.name AS "cityName" FROM CM_CUSTOMER_INFO a LEFT JOIN sys_area sap ON sap.code=a.province LEFT JOIN sys_area sac ON sac.code=a.city WHERE a.customer_id = #{customerId} AND a.del_flag = '0'

SELECT a.office_id AS "officeId", syso.name AS "officeName", a.id AS "employeeId", a.name AS "employeeName" FROM sys_user a INNER JOIN sys_office syso ON a.office_id = syso.id AND a.id = #{employeeId} AND a.del_flag = '0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO im_invoice( id, proc_ins_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, order_no, ticket_method, invoice_title, taxpayer_ident_no, deposit_bank, bank_account, invoice_address, telephone, new_remarks, recipients, rep_telephone, workflow_status, address ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{procInsId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{orderNo}, #{ticketMethod}, #{invoiceTitle}, #{taxpayerIdentNo}, #{depositBank}, #{bankAccount}, #{invoiceAddress}, #{telephone}, #{newRemarks}, #{recipients}, #{repTelephone}, #{workflowStatus}, #{address} )
mapper.update: UPDATE im_invoice SET proc_ins_id = #{procInsId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, order_no = #{orderNo}, ticket_method = #{ticketMethod}, invoice_title = #{invoiceTitle}, taxpayer_ident_no = #{taxpayerIdentNo}, deposit_bank = #{depositBank}, bank_account = #{bankAccount}, invoice_address = #{invoiceAddress}, telephone = #{telephone}, new_remarks = #{newRemarks}, recipients = #{recipients}, rep_telephone = #{repTelephone}, workflow_status = #{workflowStatus}, address = #{address} WHERE id = #{id}
